title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Move your MSFS install to a new machine
description:
In this video we will look at how to move your existing MSFS install to a new machine. This could be a scenario which most people will encounter especially with MSFS 2024 being available in November which likely result in higher system requirements.

0:00 intro
0:10 intro for the question
0:46 locating the packages folder
3:09 checking the size of the folder
